DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective cohort study to evaluate the effect of the association of PPIs with NSAIDs in work leave time.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Effect of the Association of Proton Pump Inhibitor (PPIs) With Non-Steriodal Anti-Inflamatories (NSAIDs) in Work Leave Time.
DOC.criteria: Work leave due to a sprain of ankle (none)
